text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, cun ʙaroi xondani namoz ʙarxested, ruj va dasthojatonro to orinc ʙisued va sari xudro mash kased, pojhojatonro to ʙandi po (ʙucilak) ʙisued. Va agar cunuʙ (oluda) ʙuded, xudro pok sozed (ja'ne, tamomi ʙadanro ʙisued.) Va agar ʙemor jo dar safar ʙuded jo az coi qazoi hocat omada ʙuded, jo ʙo zanon (hamsaroni xud) nazdiki karda ʙuded va oʙ najofted, ʙo xoki pok va har on cize, ki az cinsi zamin ʙosad tajammum kuned va ruju dasthojatonro ʙo on mash kuned. Alloh namexohad sumo dar ranc va masaqqat afted, ʙalki mexohad, ki sumoro pokiza sozad va ne'matasro ʙar sumo tamom kunad, ʙosad, ki sukrguzor saved, to ʙa maqomhoi ʙaland va oli ʙirased
